H0.text: Evaporation is the process in the water cycle directly caused by the heat from the Sun.

H1.text: Runoff is the process in the water cycle that is directly caused by heat from the Sun.

H2.text: Cloud formation is the process in the water cycle that is directly caused by the heat from the Sun.

H3.text: Stream flow is the process in the water cycle that is directly caused by the heat from the Sun.

A4.text: The sun (solar energy) drives evaporation of water from oceans, lakes, moisture in the soil, and other sources of water.
